metadata.dc:author: Delgado Sánchez, M J
Alamo Juzgado, C
Bernardos Rodríguez, A
Buezas Martínez, G
Serrano Díez-Canedo, J
metadata.dc:description: Malignant neoplasms of the spleen rare. We report a case of primary lymphoma of the spleen associated with gastro-splenic fistulae. The gastric wall wasn't infiltrated by the neoplasm; a communication between the spleen and the stomach was found.
metadata.dc:title: Fístula gastroesplénica por linfoma esplénico primario.
[Gastro-splenic fistula from primary lymphoma of the spleen].
metadata.dc:publisher: Revista espanola de enfermedades digestivas : organo oficial de la Sociedad Espanola de Patologia Digestiva
